creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: ten lines, alternating between four characters and two characters; large, clearly wrritten characters; bold top and bottom borders; rectangular intaglio stamp URC, circular relief stamp at LLC; mounted on deep red board
markings: URC, rectangular intaglio stamp; LLC, circular relief stamp; on back of mount, LRQ, in pencil: [Saiko]
title: Poem
